translations: 不能治愈的；无可救药的
患不治之症者，不能治愈的人

sentences.translation: 她是个不可救药的乐天派。

sentences.sentence: Poor old Willy is an incurable romantic.
sentences.translation: 可怜的老威利是个无可救药的浪漫主义者。

sentences.sentence: A 23-year-old girl with an incurable disease can fly to Alaska and everything can work out.
sentences.translation: 一个患有不治之症的23岁女孩可以飞往阿拉斯加，一切就会得到解决。
